item.title: World Business Class flights departing from Amsterdam on KLM will now offer meals created by renowned three-star chef Jacob Jan Boerma
item.description: Source: KLM. Boerma. Beginning October 25, 2015, KLM Royal Dutch Airlines will feature meals from three-star Michelin chef Jacob Jan Boerma in their World Business Class on flights departing from Amsterdam*. As the first chef to partner with KLM for an entire year, Boerma brings a unique touch to their in-flight dining experience. Miriam Kartman, KLM’s Executive Vice President of Inflight Services, expressed their pride in collaborating with another Michelin-starred chef.
